titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Office of Admissions, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records
Office of Admissions, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:40

did.unittitle: Office of Admissions, School of Medicine, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of subject files, reports, policies, statistical composites, printed material, photographs, and studies of the Admissions Office of the Yale School of Medicine.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 27-E (YRG 27-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Medicine.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Yale School of Medicine Office of Admissions, 2006.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of Admissions, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records (RU 1005). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by topic.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of subject files, reports, policies, statistical composites, printed material, photographs, and studies of the Admissions Office of the Yale School of Medicine.
